quest.name: The Fires of Sohm Al
journal: The gossamer moogle appears to be searching for someone.

You approach a moogle hovering on the outskirts of Idyllshire, and discover that you are the very person he was sent to find. According to the flighty creature, Vidofnir urgently requests your presence at the summit of Sohm Al.

Upon meeting with Vidofnir near the upper entrance to Sohm Al's caverns, you learn that the holy resting place of the dragons has been overrun by an infestation of beastly intruders. Answer Vidofnir's request to cleanse the sacred grounds, and calm the fires that rage within the mountain's heart.

※Sohm Al (Hard) can be accessed via the Duty Finder.
You have traversed the caverns within Sohm Al, and eradicated the source of the disturbance. Return to the mountain's summit, and report your success to Vidofnir.

You return to a grateful Vidofnir, who confirms that your deeds have restored Sohm Al's agitated fires to their previous state of tranquility. The white dragon would see that this place of rest remain undefiled for the sake of all dragonkind, and thanks you for ensuring the peaceful repose of her fallen kin.
objectives: Speak with Vidofnir near the Sohm Al summit.
Return to Vidofnir at the Sohm Al summit.

dialogue.name: WANDERINGMOOGLE
dialogue.text: Ah! You're Forename, aren't you!? I've found you at last, kupo!

dialogue.name: WANDERINGMOOGLE
dialogue.text: Vidofnir asked me to come find you, and I've been searching high and low and near and far, kupo!

dialogue.name: WANDERINGMOOGLE
dialogue.text: Do you know how difficult it is to look for someone while trying to stay unseen yourself...? Well, never mind about that now─there are more important things to worry about, kupo!

dialogue.name: WANDERINGMOOGLE
dialogue.text: Vidofnir was very insistent that I hurry you back to the Sohm Al summit as soon as possible! So, uh...on your way, kupo!

dialogue.name: WANDERINGMOOGLE
dialogue.text: Right, well that's my job done. I'll go on ahead and let Vidofnir know you're coming. See you there, kupo!

dialogue.name: WANDERINGMOOGLE
dialogue.text: Well, it's about time! Vidofnir has been waiting for you, and it's hardly a good idea to keep a dragon waiting, kupo!

dialogue.name: VIDOFNIR
dialogue.text: I thank thee for answering my summons, warrior of warriors. Hasten thee to the summit of Sohm Al, and I shall speak further of my request.

dialogue.name: VIDOFNIR
dialogue.text: Thou hast discharged thy duty admirably, child of Moghome.

dialogue.name: VIDOFNIR
dialogue.text: And greetings to thee, warrior of warriors. Thou dost have my gratitude for thy hasty arrival.

dialogue.name: VIDOFNIR
dialogue.text: I have bid thee hence to Sohm Al to aid in the quieting of these sacred grounds.

dialogue.name: VIDOFNIR
dialogue.text: When Nidhogg did meet his end, his minions quit the slopes of the mountain, and its once tranquil passages have become home to all manner of beastly intruders.

dialogue.name: VIDOFNIR
dialogue.text: And worse, the fires at the core of Sohm Al rage and swell, as if roiled by some unwelcome parasite. The spirits of our fallen will find no rest until this disturbance is calmed.

dialogue.name: VIDOFNIR
dialogue.text: Thus would I have thee descend unto the mountain's depths, and sweep clean Sohm Al's stony halls.

dialogue.name: VIDOFNIR
dialogue.text:
Would that I could perform the deed myself...
Alas, my girth prevents ready passage through the caverns leading unto the mountain's molten heart. Wilt thou accept this charge I lay upon thee?

dialogue.name: VIDOFNIR
dialogue.text: Thou art generous of spirit, child of man. Know that I shall not sit idly by whilst thou toilest within─those winged nuisances whose screeches rend the air above the summit will soon learn of my displeasure.

dialogue.name: WANDERINGMOOGLE
dialogue.text:
I sincerely hope Vidofnir never thinks of me as a winged nuisance...
Anyway, good luck in there, Forename!

dialogue.name: VIDOFNIR
dialogue.text: Thine assistance is not lightly considered, warrior of warriors─I will not rest upon my haunches even as thou riskest harm at my behest. Nay, I shall strike where thou canst not, and mete out deserved punishment to those flying pests that disturb the sanctity of our holy peak.

dialogue.name: WANDERINGMOOGLE
dialogue.text: Hm? Am I going with you? I...think I'd better stay out here in case any of those nasties tries to slip past into Moghome, kupo!

dialogue.name: VIDOFNIR
dialogue.text: I am pleased with thy deeds, child of man. Hie thee once more unto Sohm Al's peak, and we shall share the news of thy success with my moogle messenger.

dialogue.name: WANDERINGMOOGLE
dialogue.text: Oh, you're back! ...Do I smell brimstone, kupo?

dialogue.name: VIDOFNIR
dialogue.text: Thou hast accomplished all I asked of thee, warrior of warriors. Through thine exploits, the ancient thing that did skitter in the mountain's core hath been excised, and the fires of Sohm Al seethe angrily no more.

dialogue.name: VIDOFNIR
dialogue.text: This holy place belongeth not only to the brood of Hraesvelgr, but to all the dragons who roost within Dravania. It shall not be defiled while I yet draw breath.

dialogue.name: VIDOFNIR
dialogue.text: The Dragonsong War did take too many from us. Even those misguided kin who reveled in Nidhogg's vengeance deserve to find peace in the release of death.

dialogue.name: VIDOFNIR
dialogue.text: The Dragonsong War doth take too many from us. Even those misguided kin who yet revel in Nidhogg's vengeance deserve to find peace in the release of death.

dialogue.name: VIDOFNIR
dialogue.text: No matter the choices that set brood-brother against brood-brother, in the end we are all children of the Father of Dragons. Now that the war is over, I wish only that the souls of the fallen be spared the turmoil they suffered in life...

dialogue.name: VIDOFNIR
dialogue.text: No matter the choices that set brood-brother against brood-brother, in the end we are all children of the Father of Dragons. I wish only that the souls of the fallen be spared the turmoil they suffered in life...

dialogue.name: WANDERINGMOOGLE
dialogue.text: Vidofnir cares so deeply for her kin─even those who mocked Hraesvelgr's brood for their decision to stay out of the war. I only wish that I could be so tolerant of my brothers and sisters when they disagree with my brilliant suggestions, kupo...

dialogue.name: WANDERINGMOOGLE
dialogue.text: Such musings aside, I should thank you for helping to preserve the peace around here! We'll be sure to keep a sharper eye out for intruders creeping into Sohm Al's caverns from now on!
